Articles.Content: 40: Do a grand tour just to plant flags everywhere.

Take the Leap of Laythe (clicky pic to play)

22. Name every bump and feature on the Mun after all your dead kerbals, their grandmothers, and the devs.

I'm sure you mean name the grandmothers and devs after my dead kerbals also, cause I've run out of bumps on the Mun!

25. Solar escape using only ion engines

26. Launch off of Eve using only ion engines

Which is harder?

I done a solar escape with just ion engines, had about 12 of them and a **** ton of solar panels and xenon gas. It was relatively easy, it just took along time, like 12 hours long. Sadly my that had that save recently blue screen and the save was lost.

Edited July 17, 2013 by AfailingHORSE

37 - Create the largest, flamiest, most awesome explosion you've ever seen on the launchpad.

Got that covered, my 21 SRB salute (2 kerbals died watching)

I done a solar escape with just ion engines, had about 12 of them and a **** ton of solar panels and xenon gas. It was relatively easy, it just took along time, like 12 hours long. Sadly my that had that save recently blue screen and the save was lost.

You can do a solar escape with only one ion engine, you just have to burn for twenty minutes or so when your as close to the sun as you can safely get.
